attributes.action: Please make it so there is no homework
attributes.background: I would like it so there is no homework since it really affects students mental health and also if people say it prepares us for the future that would be incorrect since it would be illegal to set work to do outside of a real job to do at home then punish them if they did not do it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603551
